details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.2.9 Rendering intents
details.description: Where a rendering intent is specified, its value shall be one of the four values defined in PDF Reference RelativeColorimetric, AbsoluteColorimetric, Perceptual or Saturation

rule.description: Where a rendering intent is specified, its value shall be one of the four values defined in PDF Reference RelativeColorimetric, AbsoluteColorimetric, Perceptual or Saturation

error.message: A rendering intent with non-standard value is used
